title: Latest League of Legends Statistics Show Player Base in Free-Fall!

embed.description: An ongoing analysis of Steam's player numbers, seeing what's been played the most.

body:
As expected players deserting league of legends in droves after bait and switch solo queue hijinx...

http://i.imgur.com/n9g1q7U.png
